## SEM Scoring

```{r}
library(questionr)
library(FactoMineR)
library(tidyverse)
library(lavaan)
library(semTools)
library(lavaanPlot)
library(MVN)
library(MIIVsem)
library(nloptr) 
options(max.print=2000)
```

Now No=1, Yes=2 for bdi_d_dieting
```{r}
df_BDIpositive <- df_BDI

df_BDIpositive$bdi_d_dieting <- sub(1,3,df_BDIpositive$bdi_d_dieting)
df_BDIpositive$bdi_d_dieting <- sub(2,1,df_BDIpositive$bdi_d_dieting)
df_BDIpositive$bdi_d_dieting <- sub(3,2,df_BDIpositive$bdi_d_dieting)

df_BDIpositive$bdi_d_dieting <- strtoi(df_BDIpositive$bdi_d_dieting)

```

```{r}
model <- '
BDI_weighted =~ bdi_d_sadness + bdi_d_futureprospects + bdi_d_failure + bdi_d_enjoyment + bdi_d_guilt + bdi_d_beingpunished + bdi_d_disappointment + bdi_d_selfblame + bdi_d_suicidal + bdi_d_crying + bdi_d_irritation + bdi_d_interest + bdi_d_decisive + bdi_d_selfattractiveness + bdi_d_motivation + bdi_d_sleep + bdi_d_energy + bdi_d_appetite + bdi_d_weightloss + bdi_d_dieting + bdi_d_healthworries + bdi_d_sexdrive
'
```

```{r}
fit <- cfa(model, data = df_BDIpositive, estimator = "ML")
semPlot::semPaths(fit)
```
```{r}
summary(fit, fit.measures=T, standardized=T, rsquare=T) 
```

```{r}
f_semscoring_latent <- function(fit, data, scaled = TRUE){
  
  df_sem_estimate <- fit %>% lavaan::partable() %>% as_tibble %>% filter(user==1)
  v_latent_var <- df_sem_estimate$lhs %>% as_factor %>% levels
  
  f_calculate_latent <- function(latent_var, data2){
    
    v_obs_var <- df_sem_estimate %>% filter(lhs==latent_var) %>% select(rhs) %>% as_vector()
    
    d <- tibble(matrix(ncol = 0, nrow = nrow(data)))
    for (obs_var in v_obs_var) {
      res <- data2[,obs_var] * (df_sem_estimate %>% filter(lhs==latent_var, rhs==obs_var) %>% select(est) %>% as.numeric())
      d[,obs_var] <- res
    }
    res <- rowSums(d)
    if(scaled) res <- res %>% scale
    return(res)
  }
  
  d <- tibble(matrix(ncol = 0, nrow = nrow(data)))
  for(j in v_latent_var){
    data[,j] <- f_calculate_latent(j, data)
  }
  data <- data %>% select(v_latent_var)
  return(data)
}
```


```{r}
standardisation <- function(x){
  x <-  (x- (fit %>% lavaan::partable() %>% as_tibble %>% filter(user==1) %>%
  select(est) %>%
  colSums()))  / ((fit %>% lavaan::partable() %>% as_tibble %>% filter(user==1) %>%
  select(est) %>%
  colSums()) * 4-2) * 100
}
```


```{r}

```



```{r}
df_scoreBDI <- f_semscoring_latent(fit, df_BDIpositive, scaled = F)

df_scoreBDI$BDI_weighted <- df_scoreBDI$BDI_weighted %>% standardisation()
df_scoreBDI$BDI_weighted %>% summary

df_BDIpositive$BDI_weighted <- df_scoreBDI$BDI_weighted
```
